questions.question: Considering the overall form and packaging design, what is the predominant shape of this product container?
What is the apparent primary color utilized in the graphic design elements, such as the text and illustrations on the bottle?
Based on visual inspection, what appears to be the primary material used in the construction of the container itself?
Observing the bottle's cap, what is the most apparent material composing this closure component?
Focusing on the labeling, what is the prominent color of the text indicating the product's name and brand?
What is the color of the illustration depicted on the bottle, seemingly representing a type of citrus fruit?
Examining the liquid inside the bottle, what is the visual appearance of this cosmetic product?
Analyzing the graphic style, what type of image appears alongside the product information, suggesting natural ingredients?
Considering the textual information, what is indicated as the primary function of this liquid product?
What additional descriptive term is used in the product's title, suggesting a certain cleansing method?
Based on the visual details, what is the color of the small droplet-like designs on the label?
Considering the label, what appears to be the brand name or logo printed prominently on the container?
What term on the label describes the source of the extracts in the product?
What word, in the product title, indicates its state?
What is the overall visual impression of the product's labeling style?
